body.name: Outback Gold Wool, Linen, Fabric Refresher and Deodorizer Spray, Scented with Natural Lavender and Vanilla Essential Oils

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Desert Breeze Distributing Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 13 mins
features: Naturally deodorize and refresh sweaters, activewear, upholstery, bedding, towels, curtains, carpet, rugs, auto interiors.
Scented with the natural essential oils of Lavender and Vanilla for a light and pleasant, mood boosting scent.
No overpowering, synthetic chemicals used. Only natural ingredients to deodorize and refresh.
For use on wool, linen, alpaca, cashmere, cotton, synthetics, and more
body.description: Plant Based Wool & Linen Spray Naturally Freshen and Deodorize This powerful yet gentle spray naturally freshens and quickly eliminates unwanted odors between washings of your favorite woolens, linens, and difficult to wash items such as upholstery, curtains, auto interiors and more. Made with plant based deodorizers and scented with the calming, mood boosting essential oils of lavender and vanilla. With Outback Gold Wool & Linen Spray, you can keep your clothing and other fabric and fiber items fresh and odor-free. Natural lavender scent with a hint of real vanilla. Refresh and deodorize wool, cashmere, linen, fabric, bedding, sweaters, jackets, upholstery, auto interiors, workout clothing, socks, and more! No overpowering, synthetic chemicals. NOTE: Not for use on delicate fabrics susceptible to water spots such as silk, suede, and leather or porous surfaces such as wood or concrete. If unsure, spot-test on a small, concealed area first.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Active Ingredients: Zinc Ricinoleate, a natural odor absorber and neutralizer derived from castor bean seeds, effectively eliminates odors. Lavender and Vanilla essential oils - provides a delightful light, fresh scent and aromatherapy experience. Lanolin - a natural protectant and conditioner. Beneficial for all types of fibers. Plant Based Wool & Linen Spray Naturally Freshen and Deodorize This powerful yet gentle spray naturally freshens and quickly eliminates unwanted odors between washings of your favorite woolens, linens, and difficult to wash items such as upholstery, curtains, auto interiors and more. Made with plant based deodorizers and scented with the calming, mood boosting essential oils of lavender and vanilla. With Outback Gold Wool & Linen Spray, you can keep your clothing and other fabric and fiber items fresh and odor-free. Natural lavender scent with a hint of real vanilla. Refresh and deodorize wool, cashmere, linen, fabric, bedding, sweaters, jackets, upholstery, auto interiors, workout clothing, socks, and more! No overpowering, synthetic chemicals. NOTE: Not for use on delicate fabrics susceptible to water spots such as silk, suede, and leather or porous surfaces such as wood or concrete. If unsure, spot-test on a small, concealed area first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well to help remove wrinkles from wool sweaters
reviews.reviewText: I have only use this once so far, when a wool sweater has been left in a crumpled state for some time and needed to be the wrinkled, but not washed. I sprayed the sweater with this and then left it on a flat surface to dry out and all was well. Expect to use it for the same reason in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tiene un olor suave
reviews.reviewText: Tiene un olor suave le quita el olor a guardado a las prendas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my fine fabric shawls!
reviews.reviewText: A family member gave me some vintage, high-end shawls and scarves, and I wasn't sure how I was going to clean and freshen them after they had been in storage for so many years, many are dry clean only. Even after spreading them out flat in my laundry room to breathe for a few days, they still had a bit of a "dusty closet" smell, so I tried this spray on them. Not only did it remove the dusty smell, it made the fabrics smell nice and fresh! The spray smells strong at first, but fades to a gentle fragrance of lavender and vanilla- one of my favorite combinations. The spray comes out in a very fine, even mist, and it has not left droplet or dark marks on the materials.I am very happy with the scent and effectiveness of this fabric refresher spray, and it's very useful to me for my vintage clothing collection.Outback Gold Wool, Linen, Fabric Refresher and Deodorizer Spray, Scented with Natural Lavender and Vanilla Essential Oils

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice product, poor sprayer
reviews.reviewText: I like the scent and the freshening power of this product. However I had to transfer the liquid into a proper spray bottle because the one it comes in is so stiff and hard to press that it is unusable. Once in a better sprayer, I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Freshens up clothing and using on bed linen
reviews.reviewText: This lavender scented linen spray is so nice. The scent is very natural and the ingredients appear to be pure. This works fairly well on clothing - I use it on my workout clothes before I can get a load of laundry done. It also works very nicely on bed linens as lavender essential oil promotes relaxation and sleep. It's anti-stress in a bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Scent doesnt last long and doesnt deodorize
reviews.reviewText: Scent only present when first sprayed on wool coat, once it dries scent is gone and odor is still present. Disappointed and wouldn't recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made in the USA!
reviews.reviewText: This is working well for me. I'm chemically sensitive and there's a lot of products on the market that I just cannot tolerate in my home but so far I'm having no issues with this. I looked up all the ingredients and nothing looks concerning according to one of the leading environmental group websites. I believe the active ingredient is the zinc which is also sometimes in deodorants. It also contains some essential oils and even though it's very faint it does have a little bit of a fragrance to it. So I would say if you're sensitive to fragrances it's okay but if you're ultrasensitive then proceed with awareness.Ingredients as listed on the label:WaterPropylene GlycolZinc RicinoleatePolysorbate 20PhenoxyethanolLavender essential oilVanilla essential oilPeg 75 Lanolin
